title: Mariano Rajoy | Facts & Biography | Britannica
snippet: Mariano Rajoy (born March 27, 1955, Santiago de Compostela, Spain) is a Spanish politician who served as prime minister of Spain from 2011 to 2018. Rajoy was raised in the Galicia region of northern Spain.

title: La Moncloa. Presidents of the Government of Spain since 1978 [Presidents since 1978]
snippet: List of democratic presidents of the Government of Spain, since 1978.

title: Pedro Sánchez - Wikipedia
snippet: Pedro Sánchez Pérez-Castejón (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈpeðɾo ˈsantʃeθ ˈpeɾeθ kasteˈxon] ⓘ; born 29 February 1972) is a Spanish politician and economist who has served as Prime Minister of Spain since 2018. He has also been Secretary-General of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party (PSOE) since July 2017, having previously held that office from 2014 to 2016, and has also been serving as the ninth president of the Socialist International since 2022.

title: List of prime ministers of Spain - Wikipedia
snippet: In contemporary Spain, the first prime minister of the Kingdom of Spain since the approval of the Constitution of 1978 was Adolfo Suárez. Due to the gradual evolution of the post, the title has been applied to early prime ministers retroactively.
